BackEndException - exception edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.BackEndException.
A very simple exception class designed to notify classes in the sdarts.frontend that something has gone wrong in the sdarts.backend layer.

BackEndLSP - interface edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.BackEndLSP.
An interface representing the back end of the LSP; the wrapper onto the legacy collection.
BackEndLSPAdapter - class edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.BackEndLSPAdapter.
This slightly more concrete implementation of BackEndLSP includes storage and getter implementations for for the most basic, SDLIP-defined characteristics of the wrapped subcollection.
